Week 1: 2 x 4-5 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 5-6 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 7-10 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it easier: Perform with hands elevated on a box or bench.
Make it harder: Bring hands in narrower to increase the core challenge.

Exercise: 2. Slider body saw (use paper plates or socks)
Make it easier: Limit the distance you slide back.
Make it harder: Add pauses at the end, or use slower reps.

Make it easier: Start from the top. Only lower partially.
Make it harder: Reach arms overhead on the way down.

Exercise: 4. Seated rack toes to bar (use chair or table)
Make it easier: Swap the pike for a knee tuck.

Week 1: 2 x 15-20 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 15-20 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 15-20 e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it harder: Place a plate or dumbbell on your hips.
